text: Grupo Nutresa is a food-processing conglomerate. It is headquartered in Medell√≠n, Colombia. It markets its products under approximately 70 different brands in 65 countries. Other activities include the investment or application of resources or cash under whatever form authorized by law and the exploration of the metal-mechanic and packaging industry. It was founded in 1920. Category:Food companies Category:1920 establishments Category:Companies of Colombia
